trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs 类用于事件为提供的值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件并使您能够指定为当前请求的自定义 Windows 标识。</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>类通过指定一个名为子例程**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs a AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>构造 AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs 对象使用当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>和将其传递给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs 对象提供给属性**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>期间属性**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，<xref:System.Guid>使用。</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>匿名标识时，才引发事件

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>构造<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象使用当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其传递<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象传递给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the anonymous identifier for the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该用户的匿名标识符。

trans-unit.source: You can use the AnonymousID property to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 AnonymousID 属性设置为在一个自定义值的匿名标识符**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the AnonymousID property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定期间 AnonymousID 属性的值**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，<xref:System.Guid>使用。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>匿名标识时，才引发事件

trans-unit.source: The anonymous identifier for the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户的匿名标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>为当前 HTTP 请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>提供对访问<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>为当前请求的对象。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>为当前 HTTP 请求的对象。
